phrases: It is finally here.
The Okinawa training camp.
The sun on this southern island is calling our names
First thing in the morning and my ears are ringing...
Why do airplanes take off so early in the morning?
Ibarada-senpai, you really are not a morning person, are you?
Not really.
And since we have got a weird outsider with us, it is even more unpleasant.
That is not very friendly, Ena.
We have not been together in so long.
Professor, why is this manga artist with us, anyway?
Huh?
Because I thought having Yamamoto-kun along would be more fun.
Do not you think that is too much luggage just for those two?
I see we are all here.
Let us go.
Let us begin that experiment known as a training camp!
Science Fell in Love, So I Tried to Prove It
The beginning of a trip always makes my heart race a little.
Proof 9 Science-types Fell in Love, So They Tried Attending a Training Camp in Okinawa.
Makes my heart race a little...
Press more closely against me.
Wait...
I will have your saliva now.
We cannot.
Not here.
E-Excuse me, I am very sorry, but if you could please fasten your seat belts.
In that case, when the experiment is completed
I am very sorry!
They are pretty much done.
I apologize for the disturbance.
Yukimura-senpai!
Please do not conduct your experiments in public places!
Why not?
It may be necessary in order to measure oxytocin,
but even I wonder about the appropriateness in this instance.
What is so inappropriate?
Even if Himuro and I initiate close contact here,
it is not as if it would cause problems for others.
People would assume I am involved somehow,
and it would cause problems for me!
Does paying heed to the inane expectations of society come with some great benefit?
Force of Impact
As your concept of tact infinitely approaches zero,
Yukimura-kun, you may not understand this,
but it is difficult to conduct this in a public venue.
Physical contact experiments conducted in public view are forbidden.
Do you understand, Yukimura-kun?
I suppose that is fine.
Tch.
What do I do?
For some reason, I feel like cuddling close to Yukimura-kun.
Now that physical contact is forbidden,
I find myself yearning for that sensation of pressing closely together.
No!
I was the one who said it!
I must restrain myself until we are somewhere out of public view.
But, you know...
It is amazing something this big can fly, is not it?
How is it flying, anyway?
It is something about wind over the wings creating lift, right?
There are a lot of theories involving lift.
But, what is more important is...
The air flowing over the top and bottom of the wings flow at different speeds.
Faster Air Current
Slower Air Current
According to what is known as Bernoulli's principle,
Faster Air Current
Slower Air Current
Lift
this causes a difference in air pressure,
which pulls the wings upwards.
It is the most common way of thinking about it.
I want to hug Yukimura-kun!
Circulating Currents
Direction of Travel
In flight, the wings create air currents which circulate in the vicinity,
Circulating Currents
Direction of Travel
that is what is known as the Kutta-Joukowski theorem...
I want press my forehead to Yukimura-kun and rub up against him!
According to that theorem, the air flowing over the top of the wings
travels faster than the air currents below the wings for that reason.
And, according to Bernoulli's theorem,
Low Pressure
the faster the air current, the lower the pressure,
and the slower the current, the greater the pressure.
High Pressure
That difference of pressure works to lift the wings...
Yukimura-kun!
Yukimura-kun!
And then...
they become one!
That ending was not right.
You should know they do not become one.
Why would you say something like that?
You are horrible, Yukimura-kun!
Why?
Bernoulli's Principle
Bernoulli's Principle.
First, take a tissue and stick it to your forehead.
and look straight down, bear.
If you exhale gently, for some reason I do not understand,
the tissue gets sucked toward your breath, bear.
Evidently, the science behind the phenomenon also allows airplanes to fly, bear.
It is super exhausting, but you stupid humans should give it a try, bear.
And... I am out of oxygen!
We are here!
It is my first time here, but it really is a southern land!
Kanadecchi!
Are you wondering why there are palm trees?
Allow this master of Okinawa to explain!
It is because...
this place is Okinawa.
That is why!
That is amazing!
It is because palms grow in subtropical climates, is not it?
The ocean in Okinawa really is this blue!
It is beautiful!
This is not a view we would see in the Kanto area.
I believe the blue of the ocean in Okinawa
is due to things like coral and shells turning into chalky white sand, right?
Because when pale colors combine with blue, they make very pretty colors.
Really...
I hear that the Kuroshiro current, which flows near Okinawa...
is low in plankton, which is another factor in it being very clear.
Still, I was really surprised!
It is my first time staying in such a gorgeous, beautiful hotel like this!
It is amazing you got this place on that pitiful training camp budget.
About that...
Actually, Yamamoto-kun paid the difference for us!
What?
That is right.
I wanted everyone to stay somewhere nice.
Seriously?
Are you some kind of goddess?
Th-Thank you very much!
That must have been quite a sum...
Do not worry.
Losing hope in tomorrow's financial future,
Tears of Blood
and surviving on bean sprouts and flour is something I am quite used to.
Do not spend what you do not have!
If my poor savings can, by vanishing,
secure a lovely place to stay and improve the mood in the evenings,
allowing me to see something interesting, then...
I will consider it an investment.
I know this person very well,
but the rest of you should be careful.
Huh?
If it is for her manga, this manga artist really will do whatever it takes.
You make me sound horrible, silly Ena.
The blue sea of a southern island...
The sound of waves crashing...
And among it all, Aika...
in your bathing suit, you outshine all the others.
Playing with dolls on the beach is new.
Aika is not a doll!
Even for you, Yukimura-senpai,
there are things you should and should not say
Sorry to keep you waiting!
Oh!
I bought us some drinks.
Thanks!
I am sorry!
I know we took forever...
Himuro-senpai.
Come on.
Hurry up!
Oh, Kanade-chan...
It suits you very well.
Yukimura-senpai?
What is it?
Yukimura-kun, does something look weird?
No.
Not particularly.
I cannot look directly at her!
So this is that thing called a swimsuit?
How can I put it...
Himuro looks 2.34 times more beautiful than usual!
E-Everything's okay, right?
It does not look weird, does it?
I have not worn a swimsuit since elementary school...
What does he think?
I wish that man would just say something!
Taking in this much UV is going to make me melt.
I see you are as big an indoor-type as ever.
'Kay, then!
Should we make this area the Ikeda lab encampment?
All you men look quite nice, as well.
It is true...
Seeing Yukimura-kun in a bathing suit is different and new...
Under the midsummer sun, Yukimura-kun's pale skin shines and sparkles...
Yes.
It is just as though...
Yukimura, you are way too pale.
You are like a reflector board.
You are as pale as I am!
Well, yeah, but guys are a level plane in front, so it is even more like...
It is because you hole up and only do research.
Excels in study and sport
Reflector board
Soccer club
From a distance, he shines even brighter, does not he?
He really does...
Silence!
Science Fell in Love, So I Tried to Prove It
Beautiful women in bathing suits is a wonderful thing.
Wonder who is going to take one of'them home...
Yuuichi-kun, you are really amazing...
It is like it is super easy to tell you are an enemy to all women...
Drinks
Huh?
You are not in any position to talk about others, Shikijou.
Come on.
You should try talking to girls once in a while, too.
Shaved Ice
Those two look pretty good.
Hey, ladies.
Yes?
Nothing!
I wonder what that was about...
That man...
I feel like I have seen him somewhere before...
Himuro-kun!
Kanade-kun!
We are starting the watermelon splitting game.
All right.
Okay!
Okay.
I have set it.
Let the watermelon splitting commence!
All right!
Bring on the directions!
Given that you are standing on the start point and you are facing the imaginary axis,
the watermelon is at 2+3i.
Huh?
What is that mean?
Kosuke-kun, she is talking about a complex plane.
Forward 3i.
Right 2.
That is how you have to move.
Forward 3i?
What is that even mean?
You do not remember complex numbers?
Really?
As a science-type, are not you embarrassed?
I feel like there is a bigger problem with the directions here,
but do I go right two steps or two meters?
Add a unit, at least!
Here, right?!
Not good enough, Torasuke.
A real science-type would have been able to split the watermelon with that.
Was it here?!
Over here, right?!
With that, next it is your turn, Professor Ikeda.
This is actually the first time I have played the watermelon splitting game.
I wonder if I will be able to do it right.
The watermelon is at 3+7i.
Go!
Oh!
I managed to split it!
It was just where you said it was, Ibarada-kun.
Are you surprised, Kosuke-kun?
It is true 3+7i does not tell you the distance to the watermelon,
but a complex plane is not any different than a regular graph.
Imaginary Axis
Real Axis
From the ration 3:7, we learn that the watermelon sits along an angle of about 67.
approx.
Which meant that if I followed the angle in a straight line,
I would be sure to find the watermelon.
Now that you have heard, it is simple, is not it?
No...
That is not what we are surprised about!
Huh?
Where are Himuro-senpai and Yukimura-senpai?
I saw them go into the shade of those rocks.
They are probably getting things started about now.
No one can see us here, agreed?
Let us do it... the close physical contact experiment...
I can finally cuddle close to Yukimura-kun.
I am happy about that, but...
When I think about it rationally...
close contact in these clothes...
Is not this a little crazy?
Hold on just a second...
I am going to have close contact with this Himuro?
She is in a bathing suit!
This degree of exposure...
The direct skin to skin contact area is not comparable to everyday amounts.
On top of which, in order to produce the hormone,
it is best for the contact to be as close and tight as possible.
As close and tight as possible!
I am going to hydrate a bit.
I collected so much saliva, my mouth is dry.
A-And I have remembered something I forgot to enter into the calculation...
Delicious
Delicious
Oh, honestly!
I want to cuddle close to him, but I feel so embarrassed right now!
Oh, what am I supposed to do?
How am I supposed to have close contact with her?
With a Himuro who is 2.34 times more beautiful than normal?
I think the stimulus might be a little too strong for Yukimura-kun.
That is where you are just supposed to go and grab her!
The two of them in swimsuits, embracing...
It would be so exciting, but...
What are all of you doing here?
For crying out loud.
Do not worry, Yukimura-senpai.
Everyone feels a little lost their first time.
That is just how it is.
What are you talking about?
Those swimsuits are going to waste!
I fully support you two in your close physical contact.
Let us think about what kind of contact would be best!
A Couple's Greatest Close Contact Problem
When two people have close physical contact, they should seek a position which offers the greatest contact area.
When two people have close physical contact,
they should seek a position which offers the greatest contact area.
Let us turn it into a problem like this,
and look for the ideal method.
In the lab, we performed what is generally known as a regular hug, but
there may be a position which allows for greater close contact.
The human body has more surface area on the front than on the sides, so
if the front of the body and under the arms are held closely in a hug,
some might say the position provides and exceedingly great area of close contact, but...
If that is true, then...
with this position, or...
even this position...
the amount of close contact does not change very much.
This one's nice, too.
Hang on!
If they entwined their legs in their close contact,
would not it increase the contact area?
If they did, it would be something like this.
It kind of reminds me of a cicada...
Would it be too hard for both of them to wrap their legs?
Yes...
Which means, it would be difficult to increase the amount of close contact any more than this...
No, that is wrong.
We have overlooked something.
When the fronts of the bodies are in close contact,
there is no reason to match the direction of up and down!
Which means this!
What life-form is that supposed to be?
That is horrible in all kinds of ways!
I see...
That greatly increases the number of variations...
No, it does not!
How acrobatic is this couple, anyway?!
I have realized something shocking.
What?
What is it?
Long ago, when I used to hug a big-chested girl,
I felt a slight distance between us.
With a big chest, when you bring your bodies close, a gap is created,
and the area of close contact diminishes.
So then, you mean...
Hugging someone flat-chested increases the amount of close contact?
Not at all.
According to this theory, the greatest amount of close physical contact
would be when two men hold each other!
That
That
That is true!
This is an extremely significant discovery.
We must put it into practice to verify it.
It is true that the reasoning seems correct, but...
And we just happen to have two guys here, too.
Come on, let us go.
You!
It is just that you want us to, right?
Come now.
Come on.
S-S-Stop it!
Somehow, it feels like these people are just enjoying themselves now...
He is taking forever...
It is the ocean!
Torasuke, it is dangerous!
Torasuke!
Torasuke!
You have to be careful at the beach, okay?
They have these things called rip currents.
Okay.
Does it hurt, Ena-chan?
No.
I am okay.
Do not do that!
When it hurts, you have to say so!
If anybody tries to do mean things to you, Ena-chan,
I will protect you!
Because I am a man who lives on love!
Okay.
Thank you.
Torasuke!
Ena-chan, I love you!
After saying that, Torasuke went and accidentally peed in the ocean, right?
Ah, memories...
Stop it!
I do not know anything about such a dark past!
You were such a cute little boy back then,
then you went and got uselessly large.
And you stayed a tiny pipsqueak while your eyes rotted away.
You remember a person's disgrace in perfect detail!
That is because women remember.
Coordination between the right and left brain is stronger than in a man's brain.
Left Brain
Right Brain
It is hard to forget experiences where emotions were involved.
Those times I was in danger and you became a human barrier to protect me,
I just cannot forget them.
Those words should be spoken by someone a little more delicate!
Oh.
If you are headed to the bathroom, buy some roasted squid on the way back.
It is that science-type woman from before...
Why is she in Okinawa?
What happened?
Both of them were pretty cute.
What is up?
You get dumped, Yuuichi-kun?
No, moron.
When I saw her face, she just was not my type.
You move too slow.
Hurry up and go grab a girl or two.
I will.
Next, I am trying that one.
Huh...
Small, but not bad at all.
Right?
Seems like you could get a lot of play out of that one, right?
Honestly.
That little pipsqueak...
Roasted squid is stupid expensive!
Huh?
That Ibarada, it is weird but does not it look they are ganging up on her?
That woman?
There is no way!
She is got to be making it look like they are ganging up on her.
It is a trap.
Yukimura-senpai said so before, did not he?
I am sure you have heard the story of Schrodinger's cat.
Falsehood
Truth
Cubit
In quantum physics, a thing can be in two states at the same time.
Which means that right now, she is getting ganged up on for real,
and she is just talking peacefully, are the two states,
and it is not clear which she is in...
If I observe, it will become clear which it is!
My prediction is that she is actually
just having fun talking about Pakemon Do, or something...
I just know that is going to be the punchli
'Sup?
And who are you?
Well, I am not really doing this because I want to...
But, I am a man who lives on love, so...
Sorry, but...
this pipsqueak here,
do not you touch her.
Torasuke, it is not like they did anything to me...
That is right!
We were just playing PakeDo!
You got to be kidding me!
Schrodinger!
I misunderstood!
I am so sorry!
Not at all.
We are sorry, too.
Yuuichi-kun always grabs girls' arms...
That is right.
Cannot be helped.
We are talking about Yuuichi-kun here.
This pipsqueak here, do not you touch her.
That is so cool!
Super cool!
Shut up!
Just like you said so long ago,
you really did protect me.
Stop talking!
Forget all of it!
Not possible.
I cannot forget.
Memories of experiences where emotions are involved cannot be forgotten.
How could I forget this?
I am never going to forget.
Thanks,
Torasuke, for protecting me.
Stop talking...
Thanks.
Oh, it is so ridiculous...
Shut up...
Well, everyone, shall we withdraw?
We had so much fun!
I managed to take so many reference photos...
What is wrong?
Please, do not mind me.
I just had a little repeat of a super-dreadnought level section of my dark past...
Himuro, I am sorry.
I meant to return quickly, but...
If you were not feeling well, it was not something you could help.
I just cannot tell her!
He thought so hard about that stupid couple's greatest close contact problem,
he got so excited he passed out...
Everyone, I am glad you all found a way to enjoy yourselves.
I was able to do some weighted long-distance swimming, for the first time in a long time.
Why is it that you train your body so much, Professor?
There is a Nobel prize winner in physics from Saitama University,
Professor Kuze, and I had the chance to meet him.
Nobel Prize in Physics Professor Kuze Takaomi
Really?
At the time, I was not able to lay a single finger on him.
And it is not just Professor Kuze.
In the world of academics, geniuses that beggar the imagination,
unimaginable monsters seethe in tremendous numbers.
You will not survive in a world dominated by superhumans if you do not train a little!
The professors at the presentations tomorrow are all strong, too!
Let us do our best, okay?
Huh?
We are giving presentations in a huge gathering of monsters?
